name: Master Fencer
description:
Play as a young fencer Actio in this light puzzle game where you need to adapt to your adversaries' stances and tactics.

Slash, feint and riposte to gain adventages or block incoming attacks. You may win rounds either by killing off your opponents  or by shredding their clothes to pieces forcing them to leave arena in disgrace.

Here is the music I've used for the game:

https://www.looperman.com/loops/detail/70652/nilooy-guitar-rhythm-gm-asharp-cm-b...
